channel.title: Releasing Pkz-Evolution

item.title: Releasing Pkz-Evolution
item.dc:creator: @OwnerGriffin OwnerGriffin
item.description:
@OwnerGriffin wrote:

[quote=“JAM3S, post:11, topic:407769”][quote author=Catay link=topic=509046.msg3693150#msg3693150 date=1312252854]
Compiler works perfectly but when I start “Run with CMD” or “Run with Wind7”, the client loads but an errors shows in the cmd:

[quote]The system cannot find the path specified.
Pkz-Evolution
java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Pkz-Evolution[V8.]\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The sys
tem cannot find the path specified)
at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.FileReader.(Unknown Source)
at client.setNewMaps(client.java:67)
at client.startUp(client.java:8128)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:5580)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
java.net.MalformedURLException: no protocol: www.branscape.info/DC.zip
at java.net.URL.(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URL.(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URL.(Unknown Source)
at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:99)
at Update.(Update.java:27)
at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4324)
at client.startUp(client.java:8138)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:5580)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
error[/quote]
[/quote]

Thank’s it has now been fixed!

Please redownload the Source and client then run the client then the cache will download![/quote]

Still doesn’t work. I was seriously hoping for the client to work and how can I make it so you can’t spawn?

Read full topic
